resources.string: Something was wrong with the connection. Try later.
We have a problem with your GPS location.
Please connect to your Pokemon Account.Your info is safe, we do not store anything.
If you want, you can use a test account but you would not see the Pokemon that are visible to only you.
To use PikaPika we need you to accept these permissions
To use PikaPika you need to allow the location services and activate it
No pokemon found. If the problem persists, try to logout/login.
To move the pointer this far could get you ban. Currently we don\'t support this.
Just tap the map for 2s to change your position (limited to 700 meters from your last research to prevent users from ban).

How to move your position?

On the map, press the place you want to search for 2s. We don’t allow to search for more than 700 meters in order to not cheat and to not create problems to your account

Why do you need me to connect?

We have thousands of users and we can’t have an account to share for everybody. So we ask you to connect. You can (and we recommend) to use an account of test. Any gmail email will do the job. Your info is totally safe, you don’t connect to our servers but to Google.

Can I be ban using PikaPika?

You should not because we prevent you from scanning far from your actual position. But we advise you to use a test account

Why did you put Ads?

We have thousands of users so we have to rent servers to offer you a great service. There are pretty expensive so we need ads to follow the PikaPika adventure.

Can I contact you?

Sure, you can write us to pikapika.app@gmail.com or look for us on

Facebook

Twitter
